forum.content:
Hey there!
Finally got back and settled in Taichung, I lived in San Francisco quite a long time.

Age: 25-30 yrs

For me, I don't have any bad habits. Non-smoker, I like to go swimming, mountain climbing, riding a bike, ping-pong, sometimes go out for partying or clubbing pretty casual and love meeting new people

If you ever want to talk to me, please shoot me a message, thanks! :D
I am a fun to be with, easy-going person...
Working at a bicycle trading company as foreign sales, decent & stable job, last but not least, always a pleasure to get to know me...wishing you all have a good evening :)
forum.title: Looking for someone who wants to date
